name: The Great Deer
description:
What is The Great Deer?
The Great Deer is a modern point-n-click adventure game. You play as an intrepid explorer searching for an artefact of great value. Journey into an ancient temple, discover the secrets within, and uncover the truth behind a sinister ritual taking place within its walls.
Features:
  • Hand drawn graphics
  • Simple navigation with arrows
  • Fun puzzles
  • Dark and mysterious story
  • Original soundtrack by Aliel Hernandez
